attributes.action: make a pledge to the British people that the increase in fuel, cigs and alcohol duty will reduce proportionately when VAT goes back-up to 17.5%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Duty on cigs, beer, wine, spirits and fuel will rise to offset the reduction of VAT from 17.5% to 15%.

When VAT rises again (as planned) to 17.5%, duty on the above items should be reduced to maintain the balance.

If VAT rises to 17.5% but no reduction in duty is made, then we have been given short-term relief at the expense of longer-term higher taxes (duty is a tax).
